description.de: Dieses Vokabular basiert auf dem W3C Standard DPV, Data Privacy Vocabulary, verfügbar unter https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/. Insbesondere auf der Klasse dpv:ConsentStatus und deren Subklassen.
description.en: This vocabulary is based of the W3C Standard DPV, Data Privacy Vocabulary, avaiable at https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/. Specifically dpv:ConsentStatus and its subclasses.

description.de: Dieses Vokabular basiert auf dem W3C Standard DPV, Data Privacy Vocabulary, verfügbar unter https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/. Insbesondere auf der Klasse dpv:Consent und deren Subklassen.
description.en: This vocabulary is based of the W3C Standard DPV, Data Privacy Vocabulary, avaiable at https://w3c.github.io/dpv/2.0/dpv/. Specifically dpv:Consent and its subclasses.

description.de: Dieses Vokabular basiert auf dem Dublin Core Collection Description Frequency Vokabular, verfügbar unter https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/collection-description/frequency/.
description.en: This vocabulary is based on the Dublin Core Collection Description Frequency Vocabulary, available at https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/collection-description/frequency/.

description.de: Dieses Vokabular basiert auf dem IANA-Vokabular für Medientypen, verfügbar unter https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml
description.en: This vocabulary is based on the IANA media types vocabulary, available at https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

label: MIME type vocabulary based on IANA media types

description.de: Dieses Vokabular stellt RKI-spezifische Themen und Inhalte zusammen.
description.en: This vocabulary compiles RKI-specific topics and themes.
